/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, their facades painted in shades of beige and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape.
